attributes.action: clear Jade Goodey's name from being a so called 'Racist'!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jade Goodey is not a racist. Most people that are calling her this, didnt even watch the Channel 4 Celebrity Big Brother show. There are many of us that want to clear Jade Goodey's name instead of joining the band wagon and ruining her just for the sake of it.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
